description.value:
Whether you were born to high society or merely appointed to it later in life, you have learned and internalized the customs and manners of the who's-who. Though entreating with other figures of influence can be an exhausting ordeal at times, it's certainly not without its perks.

Skill Proficiency: Pick one of the following: Culture, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Perform, Persuasion.

Other Proficiency: Pick one of the following:

  • You are proficient in one of the following trades: Art (Choose any Specialization), Entertainment (Singing, Dance, or Musical Instrument), or Subterfuge
  • You can speak, read, and write one additional language of your choice.

Background Feature: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.2BWN854LL0WQ39J3]{Institutional Sway}

Equipment: A @Compendium[undertaking.adventuring-gear.TP360O8J6NS78EC9]{signet ring} and one of the following: an @Compendium[undertaking.tool-kits.FE8ZCSBLXZD50D4E]{art kit}, @Compendium[undertaking.tool-kits.8RRVDG3OJMU71FXS]{subterfuge kit}, or @Compendium[undertaking.tool-kits.R137NV7U0IJFS38B]{entertainment kit}.
